title: September 20th, 2021 - Rick & Bubba Show
description:
Sponsors:
Vincero is the maker of premium watches, sunnies, and lifestyle accessories. The sharp style, quality craftsmanship, and fair price are what we love about Vincero. Vincero has a collection and look for every walk of life. Don’t settle for less than Vincero Collective. They have a collection for every look, quality you can be proud of, and a price point you can feel good about. And to make you feel even better, as a thanks for our partnership, Vincero is offering 15% off to our listeners if you go to https://vincerocollective.com/RICKBUBBA.

Uprising: Here at Uprising™, we are waging war on gut health! We want YOU to finally win. With 95% of people suffering from the fiber gap it's time for the good gut bugs to get some reinforcements. Our weapons of choice, the Uprising™ superfood cube + chip combo, the likes of which this world has never seen before. Between the painstakingly chosen ingredients and the perfectly proportioned recipe, our foods pack an unmatched health boosting + taste buds pleasing combination! GO TO UPRISINGFOOD.COM AND USE CODE RICKBUBBA TO GET $10 OFF THE STARTER BUNDLE. IT'S KINDA LIKE A MINI TRIP TO THE GROCERY STORE MINUS ALL THE UNHEALTHY DISTRACTIONS. AND THEY SHIP DIRECTLY TO YOUR DOOR.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
